name: Help Paying for Childcare
description: Children’s Council offers a variety of financial assistance programs that may partially or completely cover the costs of care for children from birth until the age of 13 (for state funded programs only).
fullDescription: Children’s Council offers a variety of financial assistance programs that may partially or completely cover the costs of care for children from birth until the age of 13 (for state funded programs only).
whatTheyOffer: Children’s Council offers a variety of financial assistance programs that may partially or completely cover the costs of care for children from birth until the age of 13 (for state funded programs only).
howToGetIt: Go here: https://www.childrenscouncil.org/families/help-paying-for-child-care/child-care-financial-assistance-eligibility-calculator/ Or you can speak directly to a Resource & Referral staff by calling us at 415.343.3300 or email rr@childrenscouncil.org, who can help to determine if you are income eligible for child care financial assistance.
